name: As-of-yet-untitled Bullet Hell Jam entry
description:
AOYUBHJE is a game where you are your own enemy.

Place bullet spawners to get points, but don't confine yourself too much! It's all about finding the right balance.

Will you play it safe and only place a couple of spawners, or place as many as you can and get a massive score?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Shift or Space - Dash

Mouse - Select and place spawners

Note about the HTML5 build:

It's identical to the downloadable version, but it's missing a few visual effects.
